name: Pooriyan Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Pooriyan Recipe: All purpose Flour ½ kg Clarified Butter 2-3 tbsp Baking Soda 1 pinch Oil for frying Salt as required
instructions: Take a mixing bowl add ½ kg of all purpose flour , 2-3 tbsp of clarified butter Add a 1 pinch of baking soda and add as required salt to make a soft dough. Now make small small balls and roll it with the help of rolling pin. Now heat the oil in a deep wok and fry the pooriyan. Now pooriyan is ready.
